name: Supersonic Fuzz Gun
details:
The Supersonic Fuzz Gun is a completely unique and different take on a fuzz pedal made with the extreme manipulator in mind.The Supersonic Fuzz Gun is a completely unique and different take on a fuzz pedal made with the extreme manipulator in mind. The controls interact with each other in an amazing and interesting way to create a huge array of gated and oscillating fuzz sounds. Control knobs are for Bias, Density, Fuzz, Filter, and Level. Switches are for true bypass and Oscillation / Gate modes.
https://www.deathbyaudiostore.com/ProductDetails.asp?ProductCode=DBA005
